Video Transcript

Let’s explore the copyright protection section.

This certificate serves as valuable evidence in the event of any copyright disputes.
Opposing parties will be required to provide proof of possession prior to the noted timestamp.

The certificate provides undeniable proof that the uploaded manuscript was in your possession on the specified date.

To safeguard your copyright, a unique digital hash has been generated for your manuscript.

This hash, created using a secure cryptographic algorithm, acts as an electronic fingerprint of the original content, ensuring the integrity of the manuscript.
Any modification made to the manuscript’s contents will result in a different hash value, providing clear evidence of tampering.

To obtain your copyright protection certificate,
simply fill in the following details:
book title, subtitle, and the author’s full name.

click on the ‘upload manuscript’ button the proceed with the upload.

Once you have completed the necessary steps, click ‘Submit’

congratulations! you can now download your copyright certificate as a PDF file.

If you have already uploaded your manuscript before,

you can simply download the existing certificate

or click the ‘re-upload’ to make changes in your details

and upload a new manuscript.

If you have generated multiple certificates, accessing the menu will display all the certificates that have been created, from this list you can easily select the specific certificate you wish to download.
